p:
X-ray diffraction pattern for the Ag 30Li 70 alloy, including settings on the experimental run, followed by two columns with the 2θ(°) and Intensity(a.u.) normalized to an I max = 100. No zero-shift correction and no normalization were performed. The configuration of the diffractometer is Bragg-Brentano and the sample was polycrystalline. The source used was CuKα.
2
- Ag4Li9-gamma-disordered-calculated-XRD.txt
